title: Update Google site verification meta tag content to 3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7

requirements.summary: Replace the existing Google site verification meta tag content in frontend/index.html from the current value to '3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7'
acceptanceCriteria: The meta tag in frontend/index.html has name='google-site-verification'
The content attribute value is exactly '3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7'
The meta tag remains in the <head> section
No other meta tags are modified

file_operations.description: Update the content attribute of the google-site-verification meta tag to '3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7'. Locate the meta tag with name='google-site-verification' in the <head> section and change only its content attribute value while preserving all other meta tags and HTML structure unchanged.
